tool.help:
rpReport =========
Generates HTML pages to explore the main characteristics (thermodynamics, fluxes, number of metabolic steps, reaction rule score) of pathways predicted with RetroPath suite
Input -----
Required:
* **source_path**: (string) Path to a tar archive (default) or folder (using '-d' option) containing rpSBML file(s).
Output ------ * **output_folder**: (string) Output folder where report file(s) will be generated.
